fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not shoot Night 1.
- Your attack will display as a Town Killing's attack.
- Only spawns if a Serial Killer like role spawns or if the Serial Killers faction spawns. You win with these roles and the faction.
- If all Serial Killer like roles die, you gain infinite bullets, your kill now displays as a "Blue Vigi's" kill, and you're told the message *"All Serial Killers have died! It is time to finish their job."*
- If you survive, Serial Killers win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with other Serial Killers or finish the job.
